 Viney Corporation Limited
Viney corporation limited who looks after the Design, Development & Manufacturing
of. Speed Sensors, Wire Harness plastic parts/connectors, terminals, Teflon and auto-
grade wires, automotive lamps, fuse box, relays, switches, cap noise suppressors and 
rubber components. for commercial vehicles. The company is awarded with, ISO/TS 
16949: 2009 certification.
Companys major customer includes Hero Honda, Denso, Napino, Pricol , 
Bajaj , Yahama,Maruti 
Renault,fiat etc.
 Vimer Cati Spa 
Italy & Romania
 ( Viney Corporation is a major Stakeholder )
Vimercati is independent company, fully involved in planning, industrializing and
producing electromechanical and electronic components, switches, modules,
mechatronic units and integrated devices for the automotive market
Vimer Cati is a first tier equipment manufacturer which supplies, both directly to OEMs and to Tier-
1 system suppliers, to BMW, Rolls Royce, Mini, Volkswagen, PSA Group, Renault, Opel, Nissan,
Fiat, Alfa Romeo, Lancia, Iveco, Maserati, Ferrari, DAF, Chrysler.
Designation:- Process Quality Assurance
TENURE:- MAY-15 TO MAY-16
 Job Responsibility:-
 
 
 

Responsible for Final Inspection Quality.

Responsible for making Pre-Dispatch inspection Report.

 Responsible for making control Parameter Sheet.

Responsible for conduction of Dock audit/ Product audit / Process audit.

Responsible for making Work Instruction, Inspection Standard & Quality Alert.
TENURE:-JUNE-16 TO TILL DATE
 Job Responsibility:-
 
 
 

Responsible for In process Inspection Quality.

Responsible for making A3 sheet, action plan by analysing the root cause for in-
house rejection at Process stage. 

 Coordinating with all dept for problem solving by using 7QC Tools . 

Participate in Failure Mode And Effect Analysis (FMEA).

Maintaining Control plan and FMEAs though out the life of part

Responsible of instrument calibration and making calibration plan and schedule.

Responsible for availability of formats, Document & Master list updation. 

Responsible for Internal Improvement& External Improvement in company.
ADDITIONAL EXPERIENCE
 
 :- 

Determine when process stability and capability studies should be performed on existing 
processes. Review and analysis results. 

Participate in the Pre-launch production trail run process monitoring.

Apply appropriate use of statistical techniques.

Determine and apply appropriate Measurement System Analysis tools.

Participate in the Advanced Product Quality Planning activities to determine appropriate 
use of existing and new measurement system during new tool or process design and start 
up. 
INSTRUMENT KNOWLEDGE

Vernier Calliper, Micrometer, Profile Projector, Flatness Tester, Pin 
Height Gauge, Torque Tester, spoke tension measurement.
